action.comment: Snapshot raid buffed stats before combat begins and pre-potting is done. # Generic on-use trinket line if needed when swapping trinkets out. #actions+=/use_item,slot=trinket1,if=active_enemies=1&(buff.bloodbath.up|(!talent.bloodbath.enabled&(buff.avatar.up|!talent.avatar.enabled)))|(active_enemies>=2&buff.ravager.up)
This is mostly to prevent cooldowns from being accidentally used during movement.
Skip cooldown usage if we can line them up with bladestorm on a large set of adds, or if movement is coming soon.
This incredibly long line (Due to differing talent choices) says 'Use recklessness on cooldown, unless the boss will die before the ability is usable again, and then use it with execute.'
May as well throw storm bolt if we can.

action_detail.name: berserker_rage
action_detail.tooltip: Immune to Fear, Sap, and Incapacitate effects.
action_detail.description: You go berserk, removing and granting immunity to Fear, Sap and Incapacitate effects for $d.

action_detail.name: bladestorm
action_detail.tooltip: Deal area damage every $t1 sec. Immune to crowd control.
action_detail.description:
Become an unstoppable storm of destructive force, striking all targets within $50622A1 yards $?s23881[for $50622sw2 Physical damage with your main-hand and $95738sw2 Physical damage with your off-hand][for $168969sw2 Physical damage] every $t1 sec for $d. You are immune to movement impairing and loss of control effects, but can only use Taunt and other defensive abilities.$?c1[
Channeling Bladestorm does not prevent avoiding attacks.][]

action_detail.name: bladestorm_mh
action_detail.description: You become a whirling storm of destructive force, striking all nearby targets with your main hand weapon for $sw2 Physical damage.

action_detail.name: bladestorm_oh
action_detail.description: You become a whirling storm of destructive force, striking all nearby targets with your main hand weapon for $sw2 Physical damage.

action_detail.name: bloodthirst
action_detail.description:
Instantly strike the target for $sw2 Physical damage, generating ${$m3/10} Rage, and restoring $117313s1% of your health.
Bloodthirst has an additional $m4% chance to be a critical strike.
Replaces Heroic Strike.

action_detail.name: bloodthirst_heal
action_detail.description: Bloodthirst heals the Warrior for $s1% of their health.

action_detail.name: potion
action_detail.description: Increases your strength by $s1 for $d.

action_detail.name: execute
action_detail.description: Attempt to finish off a wounded foe, causing $sw2 Physical damage$?s23881[ with your main-hand and $163558sw2 Physical damage with your off-hand][]. Only usable on enemies that have less than 20% health.$?s146971[ Successfully killing an enemy with Execute grants you $147352s1 rage.][]

action_detail.name: execute_oh
action_detail.description: $@spelldesc5308

action_detail.name: heroic_leap
action_detail.description: Leap through the air toward a targeted location, slamming down with destructive force to deal $?s12712[${1.2*$52174m1}][$52174m1] Physical damage to all enemies within $52174a1 yards.

action_detail.name: impending_victory
action_detail.description:
Instantly attack the target, causing $?s12712[${1.25*$m2}][$m2] damage and healing you for $<impending>% of your maximum health.
Killing an enemy that yields experience or honor resets the cooldown of Impending Victory.
Replaces Victory Rush.

action_detail.name: impending_victory_heal
action_detail.description: $@spelldesc103840

action_detail.name: raging_blow
action_detail.description:
A mighty blow that deals $96103sw2 Physical damage with your main-hand weapon and deals $85384sw2 Physical damage with your off-hand weapon.$?s86346[
Raging Blow will also extend the duration of your Colossus Smash by $s3 sec.][]
Becoming Enraged enables one charge of Raging Blow. Limit $131116s1 charges.

action_detail.name: raging_blow_mh
action_detail.description: A mighty blow that deals $sw2 Physical damage.

action_detail.name: raging_blow_oh
action_detail.description: A mighty blow that deals $sw2 Physical damage.

action_detail.name: ravager
action_detail.tooltip: $?s23922[Chance to Parry increased by $s1%.][Ravager is currently active.]
action_detail.description:
Throw a whirling axe at the target location that inflicts $156287s1 damage to enemies within $156287A1 yards every $t3 sec. Lasts $s4 sec.$?s23922[
Also increases your chance to parry by $s1% for $d.][]

action_detail.name: ravager_tick
action_detail.description: $@spelldesc152277

action_detail.name: recklessness
action_detail.tooltip: Critical chance of special attacks increased by $w1%, and critical strike damage increased by $s2%.
action_detail.description: Grants your special attacks an additional $s1% chance to critically strike and increases your critical strike damage by $s2%. Lasts $d. Using this ability in Defensive Stance activates Battle Stance.

action_detail.name: shattered_bleed
action_detail.description: Inflicts $s1 Bleed damage, plus an additional $o2 damage over $d.

action_detail.name: storm_bolt
action_detail.description: Hurls your weapon at an enemy, causing $sw2 Physical damage and stunning for $132169d. Deals quadruple damage to targets permanently immune to stuns.

action_detail.name: storm_bolt_offhand
action_detail.description: Hurl your weapon at an enemy, causing $sw2 Physical damage and stunning the target for $132169d. Deals more damage to targets that are permanently immune to stuns.

action_detail.name: wild_strike
action_detail.description: A quick strike with your off-hand weapon that deals $sw3 Physical damage and reduces the effectiveness of healing on the target for $115804d. Bloodthirst has a $46915s1% chance of granting $46915s2 charges of Wild Strike that cost no Rage.
